Method Summary
 void updateErrataCache(java.lang.Long orgId)
          Updates the errata cache for orgs which have a server count less than the threshold as defined by the configuration setting errata_cache_compute_threshold

UpdateErrataCacheCommand

Method Detail

updateErrataCache

public void updateErrataCache(java.lang.Long orgId)
Updates the errata cache for orgs which have a server count less than the threshold as defined by the configuration setting errata_cache_compute_threshold

Parameters:
orgId - Org whose errata cache needs updating.

updateErrataCacheForServer

public java.util.Map updateErrataCacheForServer(java.lang.Long serverId,
                                                java.lang.Long orgId,
                                                boolean commit)
Updates the errata cache for the given server.

Parameters:
serverId - Server id which needs to get updated.
orgId - Org id which owns the server
commit - commit the database transaction when complete
Returns:
Map of results formatted like so: Key: 'errata' Value: list of erratas added Key: 'packages' Value: list of packages added

updateErrataCacheForErrata

public void updateErrataCacheForErrata(java.lang.Long cid,
                                       java.lang.Long eid)
Updates the needed cache for particular packages within a channel This isn't a full regeneration, only the changes are handled

Parameters:
cid - the channel affected
eid - the erratum id

updateErrataCacheForErrata

public void updateErrataCacheForErrata(java.lang.Long cid,
                                       java.lang.Long eid,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Long> pids)
Updates the needed cache for particular packages within a channel This isn't a full regeneration, only the changes are handled

Parameters:
cid - the channel affected
eid - the erratum id
pids - the List of package ids that will be considered

updateErrataCacheForChannel

public void updateErrataCacheForChannel(java.lang.Long cid)
Updates the errata cache for all the servers in the given channel.

Parameters:
cid - Channel id whose servers need their cache updated.
